Some are of abstract [essence](essence.html) : [Water](Water.html) [Wind](Wind.html) [Fire](Fire.html) River â€¦

Bashkirs worshipped twelve gods: winter, summer, rain, wind, trees, people, horses, water, night, day, death, heaven and earth, the one above all being the sky god.

12+1 Presiding Gods / [Planets](Planets.html) over [Zodiac](Zodiac.html) and [Month](Month.html)

Does every remaining ğ’€­ God have a corresponding star?
Every tutelary deity might have been assigned to a faintest star or constellation; We may never find out. On the other hand many stars and consolation had very mundane origins without any associated God. These were marked as ğ’€¯ even for single stars?
